instructions: Compare GDPR (EU), CCPA (California), and PIPL (China) on five compliance elements: dataSubjectRights, lawfulBasis, breachNotificationWindowDays, extraterritorialScope, maxAdminFineUsd. Return an array sorted by law.

laws.dataSubjectRights: Right to know, right to delete, right to opt-out of sale, right to non-discrimination
laws.lawfulBasis: No explicit lawful basis required; focuses on consumer rights and opt-out mechanisms

laws.dataSubjectRights: Right to access, right to rectification, right to erasure, right to restrict processing, right to data portability, right to object, rights related to automated decision making
laws.lawfulBasis: Consent, contract, legal obligation, vital interests, public task, legitimate interests

laws.dataSubjectRights: Right to access, right to correct, right to delete, right to data portability, right to withdraw consent
laws.lawfulBasis: Consent, contract necessity, legal obligation, public interest, legitimate interest
